attributes.action: open immediate discussions with the Pope regarding the canonization of Jade Goody.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Jade Goody's recent death has left Britain crestfallen, the magnitude of which has not been seen since the tragic passing of Diana, the People's Princess.

It is only right that Jade be honoured, and we feel that being made a saint is the only fitting tribute.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
